text: Went in today at 11:30am for a Hot n Ready 3 meat pizza. No one at the counter so I rang the bell. Clerk yelled from the back ‚ÄúBe with you in a minute‚Äù. Not a bad experience so far, right? Clerk came out and I made my request. She told me 3 ‚Ä¶More
